document.title: Environnement verbatim personnalis sous Kile
document.author: Laurent
document.text:
Kile LaTeX Ubuntu Hardy Heron verbatim Settings Configure Kile LaTeX General Configure ~/.kde/share/apps/katepart/syntax/latex.xml /usr/share/apps/katepart/syntax/latex.xml /usr/share/kde4/apps/katepart/syntax/latex.xml locate latex.xml
disable syntax highlighting in kile
